DefaultAnswers: I see, {name}. That must be troubling.
Can you explain that a little more?
Have you turned it off and on again?
My favourite cheese is Gouda, but I do also like Brie.
Please wait a moment while I check.

Responses.cheese: There is an excellent cheese shop in the Student Union Building.
Responses.dog: No problem, {name}! Dogs are welcome on campus, but not in the Library.
Responses.wifi: We have excellent WiFi coverage across the campus.
